text:
Hi everyone, there is a change coming to form script (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/forms-rendered-by-embed-code-are-updating>)
We have pretty extensible form customizations, is it possible to test the new form script to make sure nothing breaks on our side before October 18?
I don't think there is, just make sure you don't target `data-reach-id`

And also make sure that your is updated because embed script will no longer attach internal dependencies to the `window.HubSpot`  `window.HSFR` and `window.hbspt` properties. Devs rarely use these but FYI
